references.title: QAQC Engineer
references.description:
MENARD ASIA – Jakarta, Cilegon, Indonesia
QAQC Engineer (- )
Project:
- PT Krakatau Steel Harbour Stockyard
The soil condition consists of backfilling from the steel factory that is containing slack and
boulders from the top platform to the depth of 7 m. Furthermore, from the depth of 7 to 20 m,
there is a layer of sand to lose sand and soft clay. The solution is the application of a Controlled
Modulus Column with a diameter of 420 mm using rebar and steel cages to protect existing
structures.
Duties and Responsibilities :
● Set up the QAQC plan for project, undertaking and prepare all relevant drawing
/production layout / as built drawing
● Put in application on site all rules previously defined and link with production team to
improve the production based on the data report
● Prepare on daily basis the site daily report and monitor/organize quality data from machinery
● Responsible to perform and monitor crush test for mortar
● Prepare, conduct, and write all testing report (PLT, soil test)
● Liaise with the client to set up boundary’s location/ treatment area/ pegging point
● Undertaking and prepare internal QAQC assessments and implementing “proactive”
control measures at place of work
● Report to Project Manager for any production problem, mortar consumption, drain
consumption, any material consumption

references.title: Engineer
references.description:
MACMAHON Mining Services – Tapanuli Selatan, Indonesia
Tailings Storage Facility (TSF) Engineer (- )
Project:
- Martabe Gold Mine
The Martabe Gold Mine utilizes the open pit method of gold and silver mining, where the pits are
kept shallow due to the hilly topography. Three pits are currently operational: the Ramba Joring
Pit, the Barani Pit and the Purnama Pit, which began operations in 2018, 2016 and 2011
respectively. The surrounding area includes native forest, rubber, and oil palm plantations with
nearby rural villages. Waste rock or overburden from the pits is placed in the Tailings Storage
Facility (TSF) embankment rather than in waste dumps as is the case in most other mines.
Duties and Responsibilities :
● Investigate all appropriate equipment related safety and environmental incidents and
implement actions
● Oversee day by day operations of the TSF to achieve optimized plant utilization and
compliance to operating procedures, strategies, and instructions
● Attend shift supervisor handover meeting, clarify plant tatus, and challenge supervisors on
performance against operating systems compliance and delivery of instructions
● Build relations with maintenance, mining engineering, commercial team, projects, and
operational personnel
● Provide support for data request from client (PT Agincourt Resources) and consultant (Knight
Piesold)
● Liaise with the client and consultant to ensure the quality of material, design, and soil test

references.title: Procurement Business Excellence
references.description:
NUSA HALMAHERA MINERAL – Jakarta, Indonesia
Procurement Business Excellence (– )
Project:
- Gosowong Gold Mine
Gosowong Gold Mine is actively conducting mining activities on its two underground production
areas; Kencana, and Toguraci, by combining the mining methods of Cut & Fill, and Stoping. The
Kencana underground mine has been operational since June 2005. The mine uses a
combination of Overhand and Underhand Cut & Fill underground mining methods. Toguraci has
its unique characteristic not found in underground mines at other locations. That is the existence
of geothermal hot springs in the mine, which can reach temperatures up to 80 degrees Celsius.
Duties and Responsibilities :
● Developing procurement strategies that are inventive and cost-effective.
● Sourcing and engaging reliable suppliers and vendors
● Negotiating with suppliers and vendors to secure advantageous terms
● Reviewing existing contracts with suppliers and vendors to ensure on-going feasibility
● Reviewing, comparing, analyzing, and approving products and services to be purchased
● Maintaining and updating supplier information such as qualifications, delivery times, etc
● Maintaining good supplier relations and negotiating contracts

Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea
(an international health non-governmental organization focusing on improving the health of Papua New Guineans)
Responsible for providing a comprehensive HR management advisory to staff and senior
management, and project sub-recipients; Manages operational human resources and
administrative related issues, including development and communication of policies, training
administration, human resources reporting and coordinating in recruitment process,
remuneration and performance management processes; Provide consultation to management
on employee relations issues, and manage all disciplinary issues within the organization; Manage
all redundancy situations including calculations and communications to affected employees;
Work closely with management and employees on all grievance issues within the organization;
Provide senior management and others with various types of employee reports including
attrition, absence, compensation, annual leave and headcount; Management of the full local
and international recruitment process including sourcing strategy; interviewing; reference
checking; making offers to candidates; driving and delivering induction training; Processing
Immigration paperwork for visa and/or work permits and statutory compliance for licensing and
registration. Responsible for the development and delivery of employee induction program;
Provision of on-going consultation to management on performance related issues.
